section.name: About Tools Service
section.p: The Tools Service provides a service-based interface to selected PDS tools. The core functionality for this service is satisfied by the AMMOS Web Resource Platform (WRP) Tools Service. The service is currently a prototype and comes configured with minimal support for interfacing with the Validate Tool and the Transform Tool.
Please send comments, change requests and bug reports to the PDS Operator at pds_operator@jpl.nasa.gov.
